labels.label: Read the submitted requests from db

entry.value: ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('crc'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid,cqube_process_status, data_source,year,months)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}',${year},'${months}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('student_attendance'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid,cqube_process_status, data_source,year,months)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}',${year},'${months}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('teacher_attendance'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid,cqube_process_status, data_source,year,months)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}',${year},'${months}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('diksha_summary_rollup'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid, cqube_process_status, data_source,from_date,to_date)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}','${from_date}','${to_date}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('semester'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid, cqube_process_status, data_source,semesters,academic_year)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}','${semesters}','${academic_year}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('periodic_assessment_test'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid, cqube_process_status, data_source,exam_code)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}','${exam_code}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('diksha_tpd'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid, cqube_process_status, data_source,batch_id)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}','${batch_id}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('udise'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid, cqube_process_status, data_source,selection)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}','${selection}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('static'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid, cqube_process_status, data_source,selection)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}','${selection}')", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('infrastructure'):ifElse("INSERT INTO data_replay_meta(filename,ff_uuid, cqube_process_status, data_source,selection)VALUES('${filename}','${files_uuid}','SUBMITTED','${data_source}','${selection}')","")} )} )} )} )} )} )} )} )} )}
Error while deleting data which are more than retention days.
update data_replay_meta set cqube_process_status='SUCCESS' where ff_uuid='${ff_uuid}';

entry.value: update data_replay_meta set cqube_process_status='FAILURE' where ff_uuid='${ff_uuid}';
Successfully deleted data which are more than retention days.
update data_replay_meta set cqube_process_status='FAILURE' where ff_uuid='${ff_uuid}';
Successfully updated data retention days in DB.

entry.key: Log level when file not found

entry.value: select * from ( select filename ,ff_uuid ,cqube_process_status ,data_source ,batch_id ,from_date ,to_date ,exam_code ,semesters,academic_year,selection,year ,months,created_on from data_replay_meta where not exists (select filename ,ff_uuid ,cqube_process_status ,data_source ,batch_id ,from_date ,to_date ,exam_code ,semesters,academic_year,selection,year ,months,created_on,count(*) as count from data_replay_meta where cqube_process_status ='IN_PROGRESS' group by filename ,ff_uuid ,cqube_process_status ,data_source ,batch_id ,from_date ,to_date ,exam_code ,semesters,academic_year,selection,year ,months,created_on) order by created_on) as b where b.cqube_process_status='SUBMITTED' limit 1;

entry.value: ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('crc'):ifElse("select del_data(p_data_source=>'${data_source}',p_year=>${year},VARIADIC p_month=>array${months});", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('student_attendance'):ifElse("select del_data(p_data_source=>'${data_source}',p_year=>${year},VARIADIC p_month=>array${months});", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('teacher_attendance'):ifElse("select del_data(p_data_source=>'${data_source}',p_year=>${year},VARIADIC p_month=>array${months});", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('diksha_summary_rollup'):ifElse("select diksha_summary_rollup_del_data('diksha_summary_rollup','${from_date}','${to_date}');", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('semester'):ifElse("select semester_del_data(p_data_source=>'semester_assessment_test',p_academic_year=>'${academic_year}',VARIADIC p_semester =>array${semesters});", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('periodic_assessment_test'):ifElse("select pat_del_data(p_data_source=>'periodic_assessment_test',VARIADIC p_exam_code =>array${exam_code});", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('diksha_tpd'):ifElse("select diksha_tpd_del_data(p_data_source=>'diksha_tpd',VARIADIC p_batch_id => array${batch_id});", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('udise'):ifElse("select all_del_data('${data_source}');", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('static'):ifElse("select all_del_data('${data_source}');", ${data_source:equalsIgnoreCase('infrastructure'):ifElse("select all_del_data('${data_source}');","")} )} )} )} )} )} )} )} )} )}
Error while updating data retention days.
